languages.text: {n}Вы легко исправляете поломку — замыкаете одну из цепей, которую, возможно, звери поломали в драке. Закончив починку, вы запоздало понимаете — больше ничто не стоит между вами и огромным хищником...{/n}

{n}You find the issue and fix it with ease — one of the circuits was broken, possibly damaged in a fight with the other beasts. When you are done with the repairs, you are hit with a realisation: there is now nothing standing between you and this huge predator...{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Вы легко исправляете поломку — замыкаете одну из цепей, которую, возможно, звери поломали в драке. Закончив починку, вы запоздало понимаете — больше ничто не стоит между вами и огромным хищником...{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}You fix the issue with ease — one of the circuits was broken, possibly damaged in a fight with the other beasts. Once you are done with the repairs, the realisation hits you: nothing stands between you and the huge predator anymore...{/n}

{n}You find the issue and fix it with ease — one of the circuits was broken, possibly damaged in a fight with the other beasts. When you are done with the repairs, you are hit with a realisation: there is now nothing standing between you and this huge predator...{/n}

languages.text: {n}你轻而易举地找到了问题，修好了植入物。原来，植入物里的某个电路坏了，可能是和其他异虎搏斗的过程中损坏的。修理工作结束时，你猛然意识到了这件事情——此时此刻，这头壮硕的捕食者距你只有一步之遥……{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}You find the issue and fix it with ease — one of the circuits was broken, possibly damaged in a fight with the other beasts. When you are done with the repairs, you are hit with a realisation: there is now nothing standing between you and this huge predator...{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}你轻而易举地找到了问题，修好了植入物。原来，植入物里的某个电路坏了，可能是和其他异虎搏斗的过程中损坏的。修理工作结束时，你猛然意识到了这件事情——此时此刻，这头壮硕的捕食者距你只有一步之遥……{/n}

languages.text: {n}Descubres el problema y lo arreglas al momento. Uno de los circuitos estaba roto, posiblemente por un combate con otra de las bestias. Cuando terminas la reparación te das cuenta de un detalle: ya no hay nada entre este enorme depredador y tú...{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}You find the issue and fix it with ease — one of the circuits was broken, possibly damaged in a fight with the other beasts. When you are done with the repairs, you are hit with a realisation: there is now nothing standing between you and this huge predator...{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Descubres el problema y lo arreglas al momento. Uno de los circuitos estaba roto, posiblemente por un combate con otra de las bestias. Cuando terminas la reparación te das cuenta de un detalle: ya no hay nada entre este enorme depredador y tú...{/n}

languages.text: {n}Sorunu bulup kolaylıkla çözüyorsun. Devrelerden biri kırılmış, muhtemelen diğer hayvanlar hasar vermiş. Onarımı tamamladığında ise devasa yaratıkla aranda hiçbir engel kalmadığı kafana dank ediyor...{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}You find the issue and fix it with ease — one of the circuits was broken, possibly damaged in a fight with the other beasts. When you are done with the repairs, you are hit with a realisation: there is now nothing standing between you and this huge predator...{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Sorunu bulup kolaylıkla çözüyorsun. Devrelerden biri kırılmış, muhtemelen diğer hayvanlar hasar vermiş. Onarımı tamamladığında ise devasa yaratıkla aranda hiçbir engel kalmadığı kafana dank ediyor...{/n}

languages.text: {n}問題を発見し、簡単に修理する。その回路の一部は、おそらく他の獣との戦いで損傷していたのだろう。修理を終えた瞬間、あなたはある事実に気づいた。今や、あなたとこの巨大な捕食者との間には、何の障壁も存在しないのだ…{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}You find the issue and fix it with ease — one of the circuits was broken, possibly damaged in a fight with the other beasts. When you are done with the repairs, you are hit with a realisation: there is now nothing standing between you and this huge predator...{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}問題を発見し、簡単に修理する。その回路の一部は、おそらく他の獣との戦いで損傷していたのだろう。修理を終えた瞬間、あなたはある事実に気づいた。今や、あなたとこの巨大な捕食者との間には、何の障壁も存在しないのだ…{/n}

languages.text: {n}Vous trouvez l'origine de la panne et la réparez sans difficulté ; l'un des circuits était tout simplement endommagé, probablement suite à une bagarre avec l'un de ses congénères. Une fois la réparation terminée, vous réalisez soudainement que plus rien ne vous sépare de cet immense prédateur...{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}You find the issue and fix it with ease — one of the circuits was broken, possibly damaged in a fight with the other beasts. When you are done with the repairs, you are hit with a realisation: there is now nothing standing between you and this huge predator...{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Vous trouvez l'origine de la panne et la réparez sans difficulté ; l'un des circuits était tout simplement endommagé, probablement suite à une bagarre avec l'un de ses congénères. Une fois la réparation terminée, vous réalisez soudainement que plus rien ne vous sépare de cet immense prédateur...{/n}

languages.text: {n}Du findest und behebst das Problem mühelos. Einer der Schaltkreise war defekt, möglicherweise in einem Kampf mit dem anderen Tier beschädigt. Als du die Reparaturen abgeschlossen hast, fällt dir auf, dass jetzt nichts mehr zwischen dir und diesem riesigen Raubtier steht ...{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}You find the issue and fix it with ease — one of the circuits was broken, possibly damaged in a fight with the other beasts. When you are done with the repairs, you are hit with a realisation: there is now nothing standing between you and this huge predator...{/n}

Als du die Reparaturen abgeschlossen hast, fällt dir auf, dass jetzt nichts mehr zwischen dir und diesem riesigen Raubtier steht ...{/n}
